SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE , MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT, BOARD_NOTIFICATION ,BOARD_LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') COMMENT_COUNT,X BOARD_LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOTTOM_MENU_CODE = #{bottomMenuCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY CASE WHEN BOARD_NOTIFICATION = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, BOARD_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOTTOM_MENU_CODE = #{bottomMenuCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
